text:
.@weijia asks McEnany why President Trump "uses racist phrases, like 'kung flu'" when discussing coronavirus. 

McEnany doesn't answer whether the White House believes the phrase is racist, and says "the media is trying to play games with the terminology" https://t.co/Nj065CIsxp https://t.co/Ti6wzUVqJH
